title: hiring.studio by Metaview
author: Shahriar Tajbakhsh
excerpt: Free copilot for recruiting teams to generate interview questions with follow-up question suggestions. For each question, create a rubric of what bad, good, and excellent answers look like. Listen to sample candidate answers in different formats like STAR.

html:
Free

Free copilot for recruiting teams to generate interview questions with follow-up question suggestions. For each question, create a rubric of what bad, good, and excellent answers look like. Listen to sample candidate answers in different formats like STAR.

Launched in

Hiring

Artificial Intelligence
